name: Defective - LudumDare 45
description:
A game based on the Ludum Dare 45 theme "Start With Nothing"

The Hourglass Team's First shot at a Game Jam. This was quite an adventure.

Instructions:
QWER  for movement.

Hold space to attack (when you have a flavor).

Q and E to switch between flavors.

Defeat all enemies in the "Exit" room to progress to the next level.

Our usual work: https://twitter.com/Hourglass_Team
Change Log 10/8/19:

-Fixed crash in ending sequence
-Fixed music changing after going through a down door
-Fixed all door hitboxes to be less sensitive
-Fixed all licorice enemies facing the wrong way and not turning properly
-Increased licorice enemy size by 50%
-Fixed enemy hit flash
-Fixed popcorn enemies not exploding when they die
